data.title: remove /ZW option from all .c files in Win10 libSpline project
data.body: This PR removes the /ZW option from all .c files in Win10 libSpline project for all build configurations. Recent updates to spline broke the Win10 build.

data.title: Fix compiler warnings caused by Spine 3.4
data.body:
When building latest v3 branch (95e60d4124140fe2643418e3e63013ade8087fca) with Xcode 7.3.1 and Clang, I get the following warnings:

```
cocos/editor-support/spine/extension.h:86:9: 'MIN' macro redefined [-Wmacro-redefined]
cocos/editor-support/spine/extension.h:87:9: 'MAX' macro redefined [-Wmacro-redefined]
cocos/editor-support/spine/spine-cocos2dx.cpp:42:10: enumeration value 'SP_ATLAS_UNKNOWN_FILTER' not handled in switch [-Wswitch]
```

This patch fixes those warnings. Also, it has already been merged into upstream on [EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes](https://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes) repository. Here are the original PRs:
- https://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes/pull/653
- https://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes/pull/654

Thanks!

data.title: Remove redundant includes
data.body:
This PR removes unnecessary or duplicate `#include` directives to improve compilation time.
Thanks!

data.title: Some bug-fix and quality assurance for Tizen support.
data.body:
Hi, Minggo and Owen.
Please review these commits for Tizen support.
Thanks a lot.

# 
- cocos2d-x version: 3.12
- devices test on: Samsung Galaxy S4 - 4.4.4 - API 19
- developing environments
  - NDK version: r11c

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Created new c++ project
2. Ran command: cocos compile -p android --android-studio -stacktrace
3. From android studio build gradle and build signed apk 
   Before creating the project I have pulled latest build of cocos2dx. Please Note I have not touched any code or settings.
   I appreciate your help.

data.title: new actions ResizeBy and ResizeTo
data.body: New actions to resize (mostly widget) instead of scaling.

data.title: Android cpu features neon armeabi v7a
update cocos2d-console commitfault-tolerant for cocos package
data.body:
1.add mode param when call cocos package encrypt
2.fault-tolerant. call encrypt if and only if used cocos package to import plugin

data.title: Should refactor external folder structure
data.body:
Currently, there is only one include path for all architectures, for example, take a look of [this folder](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x-3rd-party-libs-bin/tree/v3/jpeg/include). 32-bit and 64-bit may have different header files, especially the header file that defines type sizes based on architecture.

We can use the structures as [v4](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x-3rd-party-libs-bin/tree/v4/).

data.title: link error caused by `bsd_signal` if building with API level 21+ and uses libwebsocket
#Improve node sort performance for 64-bit by std::sort + long long (_localZOrder)
Revert "#improve node sort performance by std::sort + long long (_localZOrder) for 64-bit"
